full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 749 Filed 08/10/22 Page 71 of 236 975 LC3KMAX2 Alessi - Cross stay there. So I don't know if he liked to show off that property or not. Q. Okay. He also liked to be in control of things, didn't he, Mr. Epstein? A. He had a very little contact with me in the later years. Q. Well, isn't it true, Mr. Alessi, that if Mr. Epstein was at the house, you would never go to Ms. Maxwell and you would go directly to him, or he would come to you? Isn't that true? A. That is not true. MR. PAGLIUCA: If we can show the witness 3504-030. At that transcript, page 6, deposition page 23. Q. Do you have that, Mr. Alessi? A. Page 23, yes, sir. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, may I have a moment to review this? THE COURT: Yes. Can you give me the lines? MR. PAGLIUCA: Yes, your Honor. Page 23, line 6 through 8. MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I would object. This is not inconsistent. MR. PAGLIUCA: Excuse me? THE COURT: Overruled. You may read it. BY MR. PAGLIUCA: Q. The question was: Who was in charge of the Palm Beach SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00018172
